text:
Recurrent Parathyroid Cancer
			                    Treatment of recurrent parathyroid cancer may include the following:         -  Surgery (metastasectomy) to remove cancer from the places where it has recurred.    - Surgery (tumor debulking).    - Surgery followed by radiation therapy.    - Radiation therapy.    -  Chemotherapy.     -  Supportive care to treat hypercalcemia (too much calcium in the blood).        Check the list of NCI-supported
